name: Tiles Battle
description:
In Tiles Battle you fight against 16 AI in a "Battle Royal". The last survivor win the game. 

Each player have  a board of 4*4 tiles. Each tile is destroy after taking 2 hits. A player lose when at least 5 tiles of its board are destroyed. 

Earn money by clicking on the colored tiles to buy buildings:

  • The yellow square gives you money over time.
  • The orange circle throws 3 consecutive shots on random tiles of the targeted board and gives you 5% extra defense.
  • The turquoise pentagon gives you five shields, Each shield block one incoming shot.
  • The magenta trapeze throws 3 shots per tile on an entire line or column of the
  • targeted board.
  • The purple hexagon allows you to destroy all incoming shot on your board.
  • The dark blue octagon throws 30 consecutive shots on a single tile of the targeted board.

You have to click on the building  when it's fully charged to launch its ability.
You can use shortcut to build buildings (1 to 6).

Click on incoming shots to pary them.

The defense stat slow down opponent shots on your board,
The attack stat speed up your shots on opponent boards.

When you hit an enemy tile, you gain badges. Badges give you 25% bonus defense and attack every 25 badges (max 100 badges). When you kill an enemy, you gain half of its badges.

You target one enemy at a time. To change target, click on  the enemy board you want to target.

The enemy boards with a red outline target you. You gain 25% bonus attack and 50% bonus defense for each enemy after 1 that target you at the same time.

Enjoy the game and don't hesitate to give me feedbacks ! If you are a lot to enjoy the game, I may create a multiplayer and more polish version of this game (with maybe other game mode like 1v1), and put it on mobile too.
